nodes.excerpt: Friday, April 30th marked the end of my four years and some months at SalesPad, LLC, and my first professional development position. It’s been a great four years at SalesPad, and I come out of having learned a great deal about my trade, myself, and what I want out of my career and work environment.… Continue reading SalesPad, A retrospective
